```{r}
library(ggplot2)
my_data <- mtcars


p_list <- list()

p1 <- qplot(mpg, disp, data = my_data)
p2 <- qplot(mpg, drat, data = my_data)
p_list[[1]] <- p1
p_list[[2]] <- p2
```


### My Heading  {.tabset}
```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
for (i in 1:length(p_list)){
  cat("####", i, " \n")
  print(p_list[[i]])
  cat(' \n\n')
}
```
